FuncDef: The display patch-information command displays information about the current patches. The display patch-information command displays information about the current patches.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays historical information about the patch status change.
-

ExtraInfo:
You can view patch information, including information about the running patch unit, activated patch unit, and deactivated patch unit, to facilitate fault locating and analysis.
The display patch-information verbose command displays detailed information about the current patch, including information about the running patch units, activated patch units, deactivated patch units, boards with patch instances, type and status of patch processes, and name of patch instance.
The display patch-information history command displays history information about the patch status change.
